Обычный сушильный шкаф, приобретенный у: A conventional drying cabinet purchased from a domestic manufacturer with manual control proved to be inconvenient and inefficient: setting the modes required constant operator presence, which reduced productivity and profitability.
После нашей модернизации и интеграции си: After our modernization and integration of a processor-based control system, the need for constant personnel presence was eliminated. Human involvement is now limited to loading and unloading, which is required only once every four days.
Возможность удалённо регулировать темпер: The system allows remote adjustment of temperature and time settings from any device. Software developed by our engineers enables flexible programming of any modes and cycles, while also providing protection against unforeseen situations. In the event of an emergency, the system will automatically notify you via signal or message.
в процессе, длительностью 4 суток, кажд: in a process lasting 4 days, the temperature needs to be increased by 7°C every 1.5 hours. Failure to meet these conditions results in spoiled products. Thanks to our automation, the entire process runs seamlessly and fully automatically.
Заказчик столкнулся с проблемой частого: The customer faced frequent breakdowns of bulky and unreliable Bulgarian-made DC motors on the horizontal boring machine 2А622Ф4.
Были спроектированы и изготовлены на соб: We designed and manufactured an adapter, bellows coupling components, and other necessary fasteners at our facilities. After testing, the machine was successfully delivered to the customer, who plans to replace all remaining motors similarly!
